description: There are only two steps to this chutney recipe - in half an hour it's ready to eat with bread, cheese or ham. Great news if you have a glut of plums.
steps: Put all the ingredients into a pan and heat gently until the sugar dissolves. Bring to the boil and simmer gently for about 20-30 minutes until the plums are tender and the liquid is syrupy. Cool and keep in the fridge.
title: Fresh plum chutney
